unexpected-error-title.defaultMessage: Please try again or <link>raise a support request</link>
unexpected-error-title.description: Progress dialog text telling user that code is being flashed

unexpected-error-description.defaultMessage: Please try again or <link>raise a support request</link>
unexpected-error-description.description: Progress dialog text telling user that code is being flashed

flashing-code.description: Progress dialog text telling user that code is being flashed

edit-project-name.description: Text for user to edit the name of the project

edit-name-project.defaultMessage: Edit the name of your project
edit-name-project.description: Text for user to edit the name of the project

download-hex.description: Text for menu item for downloading project hex file

zoom-out.description: Text label for zoom out button

zoom-in.description: Text label for zoom in button

open-file-dropped.description: Aria label for file drop target

timeout-error-description.defaultMessage: Unable to connect to the micro:bit
timeout-error-description.description: Description for error messages relating to WebUSB timeout

timeout-error-title.description: Title for error messages relating to WebUSB timeout

webusb-error-reconnect-microbit-descript.defaultMessage: Please reconnect your micro:bit and try again.

change-files.description: Header for dialog of confirmation of files changed

replace-action-label.description: Action label for replacing project dialog

confirm-replace-body.defaultMessage: Replace all files with those in the hex?
confirm-replace-body.description: Confirmation message body for replacing project dialog

confirm-replace-title.description: Confirmation message title for replacing project dialog

name-not-blank.defaultMessage: The project name cannot be blank

quit-anyway.defaultMessage: Some of your changes have not been saved. Quit anyway?

deleted-file.description: Confirmation message that file got deleted

permanently-delete.description: Confirmation question to permanently delete file

confirm-delete.description: Confirmation header of deletion of a file

created-file.description: Action feedback for creating a file

file-actions.description: Header of file actions for file

connect-microbit.defaultMessage: Connect to your micro:bit to see serial output here

webusb-not-supported.defaultMessage: Unfortunately, WebUSB is not supported in this browser. We recommend Chrome, or a Chrome-based browser to use WebUSB.
webusb-not-supported.description: Shown when user's browser doesn't support WebUSB

webusb-why-use.defaultMessage: With WebUSB you can program your micro:bit and connect to the serial console directly from the online editor.
webusb-why-use.description: Shown to encourage use of browser that supports WebUSB

webusb-download-instead.defaultMessage: Download the hex file or try Chrome or Microsoft Edge.
webusb-download-instead.description: Shown from the connect action when the user's browser doesn't support WebUSB.

webusb-error-clear-connect-description-2.defaultMessage: Close any other tabs that may be using WebUSB (e.g. MakeCode, Python Editor), or unplug and replug the micro:bit before trying again.

webusb-error-clear-connect-description-1.defaultMessage: Another process is connected to this device.

name-used-when.defaultMessage: The name is used when you download a hex file.

lowercase-no-space.defaultMessage: Python files should have lowercase names with no spaces
lowercase-no-space.description: Warning text for uppercase Pyton file name or space

name-not-empty.description: Warning text for new Pyton file with empty name

flash-project.defaultMessage: Flash the project directly to the micro:bit

back-to-main.description: Text button, takes back to main code

copied.description: Text shown after copy to clipboard

about-microbit.defaultMessage: Made with love by the <link>Micro:bit Educational Foundation and contributors</link>

about-micropython.defaultMessage: The editor depends on <link>MicroPython</link> which is made by Damien George and a community of developers around the world.

read-more.description: Action text to expand a collapsed section

read-less.description: Action text to collapse an expanded section

about-read-more-micropython.description: Arial label to expand a collapsed section about MicroPython

about-read-less-micropython.description: Aria label to collapse an expanded section about MicroPython

microbit-hearts-alt.defaultMessage: micro:bit board with the 5 by 5 LED grid showing a heart
microbit-hearts-alt.description: Alt text for micro:bit image in About dialog

software-versions.description: Heading for a table of software versions in the about dialog

terms-of-use.description: Terms of use menu option text

create-python.description: Hover text over create Python file button

download-python.description: Download button menu option for downloading Python script

load-hover.defaultMessage: Load a hex or Python file or add other files

connect-hover.defaultMessage: Connect to your micro:bit over WebUSB

new-file-hint.defaultMessage: We'll add the .py extension for you.
new-file-hint.description: Hint shown in the new Python file dialog

webusb-error-update-req-description.defaultMessage: You need to <link>update your micro:bit firmware</link> to make use of this feature.
webusb-error-update-req-description.description: WebUSB error telling user to update firmware

webusb-error-default-title.description: Default title for error messages relating to WebUSB

webusb-error-clear-connect-title.description: Title of error for WebUsb connection

webusb-error-update-req-title.description: Error text telling user to update firmware

failed-to-build-hex.defaultMessage: Failed to build the hex file
failed-to-build-hex.description: Error title when we cannot build the hex file, for example because no storage space. Additional detail is shown separately.

load-error-title.description: Title of error dialog when we cannot load files. Uses ICU syntax for pluralisation: https://formatjs.io/docs/core-concepts/icu-syntax/#plural-format.

load-error-mpy.defaultMessage: This version of the Python Editor doesn't currently support adding .mpy files.

load-error-mixed.defaultMessage: A hex file can only be loaded on its own. It replaces all files in the project.
